website_summaries.verdict: This narrow band is worth considering for anyone who prefers a feminine leather option.
pros: Crafted from genuine leather with a trim design and feminine contours
Stylish yet practical to wear every day
cons: The hardware isn't as durable as the leather, and the finish on it tends to fade with wear
Some colors look different in person

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thin strap
customer_reviews.text: Great classic look, I love the thin strap! Rose gold metal matches my watch very well, it looks sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: All in all a solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: All in all I’m very happy with the band, the only thing I can nitpick is the color on the attachment bars, they do not match the watch. You would have to be looking closely to notice so it will not stop me from wearing it, however they are more bronze than rose gold. Another strange thing is the protector that is shown in the photo is clear, but the one that came with it is an even darker bronze color that doesn’t match the watch, or the attachment bars on the band, I wasn’t planning on using it anyways so it doesn’t hurt my opinion of the band, it was just strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jeddie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Band!
customer_reviews.text: I got this band in black and so far I absolutely adore it! It is comfortable and seems durable. I have freakishly small wrists (wish the rest of me was as small) and sometimes it is hard to find watch bands that fit me well. This band has two individual straps that hold the excess so I don't have a problem with this coming loose or getting bent backwards. The fact that the band is thinner than most fits my wrist really well and the bumper that was included free is very attractive and will protect my watch very well. I will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mysteri

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice thin strap and the "rose gold" hardware matches my Apple Watch Series 5 in Gold Aluminum perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this leather band!! I bought it in brown and black. I have a Apple Watch series 4 where you can’t tell if it’s gold or pink. I decided to purchase the bands that have the gold hardware and I think it look great! It doesn’t match perfectly but it definitely makes the watch look more gold than pink. And I actually like that the hardware isn’t the exact color of the watch. I wear it everyday but do switch to a sport band when I workout because I don’t want to mess it up. Definitely recommend and will be purchasing more colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Rose Gold Matches!!
customer_reviews.text: Best band for my Apple Watch that I’ve found yet! I have tried several other on amazon and found the leather to be stiff and uncomfortable. This one is great, soft and flexible! The rose gold on the adapters matches the watch perfectly which has been extremely hard to find with other bands. I order a few more in additional leather colors.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Craver

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bands are stylish with wide range of colors but band fell apart after 2 Months of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jcole

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love this strap. Got the gray one with rose gold and I've received several compliments. To my surprise, it came with a free rose gold protective case, which made the watch look expensive. A couple of months in, I emailed the company to let them know that the paint on the protective case was chipping. They (very nicely!) reminded me that this was actually free, and then proceeded to send me a new one for free! Great customer service. Very responsive and super pleasant. I was always going to buy again, but now that I know that the company stands behind its products, am even more excited to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Laxal

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but there are production issues regarding matching up hardware color. The black leather band was received with rose gold ends which connect to watch and a gold closure. The rose gold ends match 100% to my iwatch series 4. The leather band is lightweight, slim, delicate and overall looks great! If you have a very small wrist (as I do) overtime the band will eventually stretch due to wear. You may find yourself wearing the band on the last holes. The long watch bands might become annoying overtime. Offering the band in a S/M and L/XL size would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Campbell

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! Actual band seems fine but couldn’t really say as the metal clasp/buckle does not stay on long enough to even fasten the watch on. Seems like cheap pos plastic covered my tacky looking “metal” coating. Returning immediately and will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Has Defect
customer_reviews.text: The product is made “backwards”. The covers aren’t made correctly for the crown of the Apple Watch to fit in the covers. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, comfortable, unique
customer_reviews.text: Love the band. Very classy looking, I’ve gotten several compliments in just 2 days. The gold metal isn’t the same as the Apple Watch (shiny, not matte) but the difference is tiny and doesn’t bother me. Overall I’m happy. Hopefully it holds up - seems decently made. (hence 4 stars on durability. It made me put something even though it’s too soon to tell)
customer_reviews.author: Megan Burns

customer_reviews.title: Stands the test of time and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly because I wanted a thinner band than the one that comes with my iWatch. I also liked the they had a rose gold option. I got a few compliments regarding the band, but what I like is that after more than 6 months of using it, it is still in fairly good quality. The cover/case that was painted rose gold is peeling off so I can see the original rose gold of my actual watch underneath. It looks a bit splotchy but barely noticeable. I would definitely get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tung

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but scratchy
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on after wearing it for 6 days. The bands are very beautiful and light in weight. However, there one flaw it has is the stitching on the two rings that hold the other band in place are sharp and scratch my skin while wearing. I might be able to sand it down though. My pictures show the condition of the leather after wearing it for 6 days. I’d like to note that the protector for around the watch face is from some other company to match my rose gold and brown color theme for my outfit of the day. The one given with this one was clear.
customer_reviews.author: I Tried It & Reviewed It

customer_reviews.title: Wears Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really like the band, but the bumper around the watch face wears really quickly and I had to retire this product just a few weeks after purchasing because it looked like trash with the color wiping off so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dare

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Skinny Band, Comfortable,but Big on my writs
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black band with clear case. Both look very cute and compliment the watch. My only issue is that the band doesn't have one or two smaller hole settings. I have small wrists; I'm a small person in general. I wear the band on the tightest setting, but it is still slightly too big. If there were another hole or two, I could get the band to a tightness that I am comfortable with. I originally bought my watch with the sport loop, which adjusted to any tightness. Otherwise, I really like this band.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!!  Hurts wrist, digs into wrist.....
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!!!!! Really liked this product, original review below. Today I’m updating because I just can hardly wear it because it Digs into my skin from the silver buckle area AND the stitching. See picture!!! After wearing it for a couple days Old/first review: Good quality and allows for most any size wrist. My wrist is on the smaller size and it was able to fit perfectly but will accommodate any size really. I bought it for the wrist band and wasn’t expecting to want or like the protective watch cover but found I love it to, it also fits perfectly and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: 3pupsplus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  So cute and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brown/gold, black/gold, and ivory white/gold. Love my brown and black ones! Very cute and feminine. The ivory white was a little more gray than I was expecting. I contacted the seller who sent me another band - pink sand/gold - which is gorgeous! They also sent me an extra band as well. We'll see how well these hold up over time, but I'm happy! I have sensitive skin, and I haven't had an issue with these. I also have small wrists, and it fits perfectly. There's an adjustable band holder thing to keep the band from sticking out. I just might buy a few more colors if they hold up in quality with daily use!
customer_reviews.author: exquisitemelody

customer_reviews.title: The latch is plastic. Uncomfortable against your skin.
customer_reviews.text: The leather looks good, but the latch is plastic and feels awful on your arm.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Classic look
customer_reviews.text: I love this band, it is very comfortable. I have small wrists, so I was a little concerned that it may be too large. There are plenty of holes for sizing. The excess is held flat and has not once been an issue for me. I did not give it 5 stars for durability, only because I have not even had it a month yet. I will report back after some time has passed. I did not like the rubber watch protector that came with it. But that is just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: hedgy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect band for small wrists
customer_reviews.text: I have a small wrist so those wide chunky bands are far too bulky no matter what I’m wearing so I’m very happy with this thin leather band. The color works with everything and the style is a step up from the rubber types which also pairs quite nicely with jeans. The only thing I don’t like is that the leather is a little stiff and doesn’t lay on my wrist as flat as I’d like. Hopefully, in time it’ll break-in a bit. I did put the cover over the watch, and while it was easy to do with long nails it’s totally not necessary. This is a good buy if you’re in the market for a small leather band.
customer_reviews.author: 2bMimi

customer_reviews.title: Might be uncomfortable and leather looses color
customer_reviews.text: I love the thin strap and the color, they look great with the watch. I would give full stars for comfort is not for the following issues; the metal clasp the tightens the watch is not smooth, the corner is sharp and pokes my wrist, there are also some threads on the under side of the strap that stick out and itch my skin. These flaws where not noticeable the first few days but its been bothering me more recently. I have been wearing mine for about a week. I seems to hold up to work outs and my toddler. I have notice some color rubbing off already.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff and Phill

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got the brown and rose gold band, and I have to say it looks very nice. I'm very happy with my purchase. My only complaint would be the same as wearing any normal leather watch (but I was coming from wearing a sports band so I didn't have this issue before) - the metal clasp at the bottom can get in the way of typing and or writing things and might possibly scratch a laptop surface, so just be weary!
customer_reviews.author: dragonlily

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this band is about what you would expect for the price. I wasn’t looking for any terribly fancy - just something a little more professional-looking than my colorful patterned strap. Within minutes of putting it on, I felt a twinge on my wrist around the buckle like an ant bite. Later, I had several red spots where the pain had been. A week later (even after removing the new strap), the spots erupted into this rash. Definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this band! I have tiny wrists and a lot of bands tend to be bulky and the thin ones are often flimsy so I thought I’d give this a try based on price point and other reviews. It’s fantastic! The cover is a bonus- I kind of assumed it might not work well by interfering with the button functions and that I’d throw that piece away but it doesn’t at all! Highly recommend if you’re looking for a petite band or to switch up the color of you watch case. Can’t speak for longevity yet but it doesn’t feel flimsy and at this price- I’ll gladly buy another after normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Harper

customer_reviews.title: Good for small wrists but color wears off
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely small wrist and this band came closest to actually fitting. I did behave to add one extra hole, but that’s much better than usual. That being said after two and a half weeks of wearing the band everyday, I have noticed that the color is wearing off the band. It’s pretty subtle so I’ll keep wearing it, it might be more noticeable on a darker band.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Pattern already worn off !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 2 months ago . The pattern has already worn off, and the band is coming apart! ...... Note .... .... my band has not been wet or abused ...... I am so disappointed, I wanted to love this band !! It was super cute and comfortable! The quality of this product is terrible :(
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great for small wrists!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! It’s thin and has a clasp. Which is why I bought it. It’s worth the amount you pay for. I am a very active person, so I wanted a watch band that would stay on my very SMALL wrists. This doesn’t disappoint. It’s made for very small wrists, there’s enough holes for big or small wrists. I’d buy this band again and recommend it to others who move their arms a lot or are afraid of getting their watch stolen off of their arm in the club, while on vacation, in large crowds. Etc. Find me on IG: @Inoellelynn
customer_reviews.author: N.L.T

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous with gold Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get over how nice this band looks with my gold Apple Watch! It actually looks feminine and classy. I was weary on getting a smart watch because they always look so bulky on smaller females but this band changes it up nicely and is perfect when you don’t want that sporty look.
customer_reviews.author: Keri M.

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Buy for Apple watch owners.
customer_reviews.text: I have ridiculously tiny wrists. These leather Apple watch wrist bands are beautiful. They give the watch a more feminine and minimalist look, which is exactly what I was looking for. Not a fan of the original bulky silicone wrist bands, so it is nice to have alternatives like this. I own the Dark Brown/Rose Gold, Wine/Black and Black/Black colors. Planning on investing in more. Highly recommend this product. Do not hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: thisDJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable wristbands for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this band. The first one I bought is white. It is still holding up after 2 years of wearing it. They are very comfortable and I like how simple they are so they go with everything. Also they do not constrain my wrist like bands made of rubber material that normally come with the watch. Finally, I like the skinnier bands because I do like to occasionally wear my dangling brackets with it and the thicker bands make it look and feel overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this band! It looks and feels like a great quality leather and I wanted something narrow on my wrist. It fits snugly unlike the metal link band I previously purchased. This leather belt-style band in wine color looks great with the rose gold Apple Watch and feels secure on my wrist. I just received it and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice band!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this band so far! Wanted a more everyday less sporty band for my Apple Watch. I was worried about the face being out of proportion with the band being so skinny but it works nicely. (I have the smaller face) I chose not to use the bumper but it came as a clear bumper when I thought it would be gold to match. Didn’t matter anyway since I wasn’t going to use it. The gold doesn’t match perfectly (see third picture) but it complements the case nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bugbears

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: No it didn’t work I had to return it. My watch is size 40 and the strap is not a perfect fit. I suggest just buy the strap straight from Apple to be sure the right fit and your watch will be secure and you don’t have to worry you loose your expensive watch. It’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Returning, not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The clasp on the watch band is supposed to be rose gold, to match the watch itself. It’s gold looks really cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Cch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality leather, free bumper, and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watchband in pink a few weeks ago and loved it, so I ordered 4 more colors. The new one pictured is pink sand. It is so much more feminine than the standard iwatch bands, even on my 44 mm watch. These bands are leather and do not break out my wrist like the rubber-like bands. Each band also comes with a flexible clear watch bumper and each bumper and band are beautifully packaged in a nice box, not just in a clear bag. Also, I have very small wrists and the bands can accommodate that and much larger wrists with 10 adjustment holes on the bands.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  I  LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Im 72 and got the apple watch for its SOS feature (which I LOVE)....but the band that comes with the apple watch is awful. It is a wiggly rubber and impossible to get on....everyone complained about the watchBAND not just me....so I searched and got this one and everyone compliments me......it's great and the service was awesome. It came really fast one I found it and ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful band for Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third WFEAGL watchband for my 38mm Apple Watch & I cannot say enough good things about them. While I love the functionality of my Apple Watch, I never loved the look. These bands improve upon that immensely. I am really enjoying this new slimmer band-classic-and the color is a true navy (dark, dark blue). My other bands have gotten softer over time but kept their shape with no fraying of the stitching. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kate W

customer_reviews.title: Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch band bc it is not as bulky as the bands that come with an Apple Watch- I few that it is a little more feminine/dressy. It is easy to install and also easy to put on. I broke my last Apple Watch by dropping it when trying to take off (was using the band that comes with the watch). I took off a star for durability only bc the holes are a little worn, but I do take it off to shower and go to bed... so I take it off/put back in a lot. I will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hazard

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch band. I’ve gone through quite a few different brands trying to find the perfect one & this is it! Thin, classy, COMFY, and makes me forget I’m even wearing my Apple Watch. All of my previous bands low key bugged me all day, and I’d have to re adjust or move it around. This one is super comfortable and the leopard print is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the band is thinner then the ones I buy from the Apple store. It’s a lil rough on the wrist. Hoping that I can break it in and it won’t rub so much. Overall I really like it! The cover for the watch was actually for a left instead of for the right. Wish that would have came for the right side. Don’t know why they don’t have a place to ask which side you’d like it on.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier with this watch band!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Apple Watch band. It appears to be very good quality and is comfortable. I’ve been wearing it daily for a few weeks without any signs of wear. I’ve gotten several compliments on it. It’s the perfect alternative to the sports type bands that come with the watch. I’m planning on buying several more colors as the price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: L. McGinley

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this band for about 6 months so I can give an honest review about long term wearing. It’s so so comfortable, way better than the regular band that comes with the watch. I always used to break out from wearing the regular watch band, and I’ve never had that issue with this one. Great for sensitive skin. Super durable as well, I use it for everything, working out, showering, whatever. Haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Slim and feminine
customer_reviews.text: Slim & feminine. Adjustable loops. Real leather. Don’t forget to order a screen protector as the case that comes with this one is open faced. There is no way of knowing how durable it is until it is worn for a while. UPDATE: The adjustable loops do not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.Rudick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small wrists!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had trouble with some wrist bands not fitting my smaller wrist well, they are either too stiff and doesn’t wrap properly around my wrist or the buckle and strap holders hit the bone of my wrist. Or they are cheap and wear out quickly. This one has done none of this things! I wear it at work where I wash my hands constantly, to work out and sweat on, and out to dinner! And it still looks new!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Nice Leather Band, but Need Sizes
customer_reviews.text: The band replaces the velcro one that came with my Apple watch. It arrived promptly, looks good and was easy to install. It probably will not last as long as the velcro one did but it is inexpensive enough that it can be replaced whenever needed. My only complaint is that I have a very small wrist and even though the band fits on the next to last hole there is way too much overlap. I would love to see this band made in sizes instead of one-size-fits-all.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing the stainless steel mesh wrist band since I got my Apple Watch. I would have to buy one every few months because the stainless steel would tarnish and irritate my wrist. I've been searching for a leather band but couldn't find one that was affordable and I liked. Sorry, the Hermes band isn't in my price point. Alas, I stumbled upon this wrist band. I've currently been wearing if for over 2 months every day without any issues. This is the best deal for the price! I even ordered another color for when this does start to wear. Super happy with the quality and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Bush

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The band was much easier to put on the watch than the old one was to remove. The leather and stitching seems to be well made and it fits and looks great. Very pleased with this. The plastic piece that fits over the edges of the watch itself seemed kind of loose, so I'm not using it. No big deal - I wasn't expecting that piece to come with it anyway. Day One = very happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nissa Kendall

customer_reviews.title: High quality/durable band at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 4 months now as my only band: I wear it all the time, including running/working out and times that get a little splashy (like doing dishes). It amazes me that both the band & the buckle continue to look brand new despite this! It’s easy to take on and off and I get lots of compliments on the sleek look. I would definitely purchase this band again in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Great look
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking bands. Very well made. Soft leather. Very comfortable. Bought several different colors and I am happy with all of them. Accurate pictures on this site. The Rose Gold matches the Series 5 “gold” perfectly. I like the slim bands. I find them more feminine and comfortable. will buy more colors to complete collection:)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M

customer_reviews.title: A little big.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and look!! Would have given it 5 stars for comfort and over all, but the strap is very long (I have a petite wrist)!! Would be nice if they came in different wrist sizes!! S/M or M/L. Would definitely buy more, if this were the case!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this band and protector!! Cute and professional
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this leather band for my Apple Watch! Wish I would’ve ordered it sooner. Great way to dress up your watch and make it not look like a work out band. As an attorney I’m expected to dress professionally and this band is the perfect way to still wear my watch while being dress professionally. Also love the free gift protector that goes around the watch looks great and is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: raelain

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This tapered, leather watchband is so much more "ladylike" and comfortable than the broad, rubbery, synthetic band that came with my 40mm Apple Watch. I bought the light tan band, which blends well with my tanned skin, so it is unobtrusive on my arm. Perfect. I haven't had it long enough to know if it is durable, but so far, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleasantly surprised at the quality, given the price! I’m not a fan of the wide silicone band my Apple Watch came with, so I was happy to find something a little more dressy and delicate. The leather is much nicer than I expected. I got one in black as well, and now I’m tempted to get it in more colors. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love it BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: So I think this band is really cute and dainty. However, the clasp hits my wrist and hurts like it's sharp. Also, the part where it clips into the watch doesn't fit, one side is longer and sticks out. That makes it not secure because it doesn't click into place. I would love a new one if the company would send one over!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute but sizing is ehh
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality ! I didn’t think I would use the case it came with but I ended up using it anyway! It’s not bulky at all. The thin strap is a nice change to dress up the watch more. However, only complaint is that it doesn’t fit as comfortably as I had hope. The third hole from the top is loose and the second hole is too tight...
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Azura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Great looks, Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wife very pleased with the band. Looks great, fits perfectly, very comfortable however, after wearing awhile it does stretch a bit requiring adjustment to next hole in the band. The clear watch protector was a surprise, did not know it would be included, fits great, so clear it is barely visible.
customer_reviews.author: wayne b

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend (6 months after purchase)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this band 6 months ago and I've worn it daily since then, but it still looks brand new. It is impressive quality and well priced, enough that I wanted to return and add a review. I was concerned that I would get a rash from the buckle, since I have an allergy to nickel, but I have not had a reaction at all. The only possible negative is that if you have a very small wrist, the allotted holes may not be tight enough, but more holes could be added.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! But, wearing it daily it wears out and becomes loose (just a little).I still love it because of how cute it looks. I also love that I can wear it and not get sweating with it like with the apple bands. I got the black one too and looking forward in getting the olive one too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Flor Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart and almost lost my watch after 4 months of using it. Holes are spaced well that you don’t end up with that too loose but next is too tight spot.
customer_reviews.author: A Norton

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: the product was super cute and looked exactly how it was in the pictures. there’s just one problem, the rings that hold the watch together had this sharp string that stabbed at my wrist. I had to take a nail filer to file down whatever was poking at my wrist. other than that it was easy to install and pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Caution, the look will fade after a month or 2
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s leather, looks stylish, easy to put on to the watch, but I’ve been wearing it for about 2 wells and it’s black spots are rubbing off already.... just on the side that’s on the inside of wrist but I’m sure the rest will follow by losing the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: turtlelove

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not as functional as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: The watch band itself looks fantastic and seems to be good quality. It was a struggle to insert one side into the actual watch however, so if I was changing watch bands often, I would not be keeping this product. Also, the band holders (the loops at the end of the watch band) have a very scratchy piece of thread holding them together. I had to turn them to the outside so that it doesn't bother my skin, but it is obvious that it's not supposed to be facing the outside for aesthetic reasons.
customer_reviews.author: @4x4Erik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this band. It is great quality from what I can tell. Easy to put on and fasten. I have a small wrist and have no issues. Also came with a Thin bumper. It’s like a skin. I love it. It isn’t bulky and doesn’t hamper the buttons. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but discolors easily
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable Watch band I own. It is also the most expensive non-Apple band that I own. I am super disappointed that it is discolored and worn after only five months. I would expect this from a $6 band but not from this. That being said, this is the only company that sells all kinds of color bands with matching metallic parts. Don’t know if I will buy from them again...
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir B

customer_reviews.title: Decent, yet plastic clasp and itchy restraints.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this band, unfortunately the clasp is a coated plastic and seems like it will chip or break easily and the two band restraints are itchy and look as if they might fall apart easily also. Thought I’d buy another band from this company but after noticing these two issues I’ll probably buy a different one next.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this band. I love that it’s leather and feels nice against the skin. I don’t like wide straps on watches as over a long period of time it starts irritating my wrist. This thin strap is perfect. Product arrived just as pictured. 10/10 will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I ordered. It’s very lightweight and fits great. It is just as pictured and the rose gold detail matched perfectly. I can’t comment on durability since I just received it. The band that came with my watch kept coming off so I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable strap, defective protective cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brown leather strap with the gold accessory. The band is comfortable and has many holes which was great because I have very small wrists. My only complaint is the plastic case covering, the slits for the buttons and speaker are on the wrong side. For that reason I am unable to use the plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Anahi Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Slim and nice, but kind of uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek, feminine look this watch band gives. The only issue I am having is that where the clasp is, it irritates my skin because the corner pokes into my wrist. I would recommend getting it if you want to wear this for a night out without looking bulky, but I would not wear it all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this watch band. It's great quality and not a hard, stiff leather so it has been very comfortable since the day I put it on the watch. I was a bit concerned after reading some reviews about the watch falling off, but I haven't had any issues at all. I have gotten compliments on how nice it looks as compared to the silicone band that came with the watch. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: EAG

customer_reviews.title: Buckle hurts
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way this looked, but if you frequently are on the computer or typing, I would go with a different band. The buckle was digging into my wrist any time I had to type on my laptop. I stopped using the band after just an hour of putting it on
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Garber

customer_reviews.title: Buckle and watch attachment are different colors
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable and I love the slim strap but the colors do not match. I ordered a black band with rose gold and the attachment to the watch is rose gold but the buckle is regular gold which does not match. I’m hoping it was just an error and have requested a replacement and will return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Cute, until the color rubs off
customer_reviews.text: I got this band in pink and at first I loved it; adorable, perfect fit, and super chic. However, after less than a month of use, the pink started to rub off in regular use. Pretty disappointed in the durability of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian J.

customer_reviews.title: Size slightly larger than Small Apple band.
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure is I wear my watch more on my arm than my wrist, but this band is only slightly larger than the small Apple bands provided. I think I’ll keep it because it does fit my wrist-I-mean-arm but something to consider. It’s small to feel slightly more feminine and great for everyday casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Heidekin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but may be a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 3 weeks ago and I have gotten so many compliments on it! It’s super cute, affordable and the fact that it comes with a free bumper is super cool. The only reason I am giving it 3 stars is because I do not wear it everyday, however, I have noticed the strap is starting to rip and it is digging into mg wrist, creating a sore. ): Kinda sucks that it only lasted 3 weeks but the bumper is still holding up strong.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money.  Color is not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the rose gold to match. This was a true gold and looked horrible. The clasp and mechanism seems really cheap and it feels as though it would break easily. When I placed it on my watch it was too loose, I don’t want to lose my watch- so this is not the safest choice for my watch.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMommyLoves7

customer_reviews.title: I want one in every color!!
customer_reviews.text: The band is affordable and the quality is great. The color of the band is exactly as shown in the picture. It’s a lot more comfortable than the original Apple band that came with the watch. I would purchase this again in a different color. The only thing is that it says it comes with a clear case and the one I received was black. I mainly made the purchase for the band so it’s not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice professional look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this band and the professional look that it gives my I watch. I will probably order additional colors for a change.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Do it! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Excellent alternative to the sweaty bands from Apple. I loved it so much I immediately bought two more. I don’t know how long they’ll hold up but they don’t show any signs that they won’t last as long as I need them to.
customer_reviews.author: C. Perry

customer_reviews.title: THIS watchband IS THE BOMB!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I am saying this but this watchband made me fall back in love with my Apple Watch. I have purchased MANY bands and some have been okay but NONE have been THIS fantastic. Its comfortable, beautiful, fantastic quality for the price AND I enjoy wearing my watch again because I hardly even know its there. Another review mentioned sleek. THAT is the perfect word. This band is “SLEEEEEEEK.” BRAVO. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice band
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my apple watch 40 mm. Easy to put on and I have received many compliments on the band. It is thinner than most apple watch bands which is what I wanted. It is durable, fits my thick wrist and is more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Celestino J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: At first i was really happy. It seemed like a good quality product and is genuine leather. I have had this band for 20 days now so not a full month and I wear it daily. The color on the black spots is getting rubbed off. This might not be an issue if you pick a light color band but for me, its becoming more ans more visible. I will probably get to use it for another month or two and then it will go to trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this band! The band that came on my watch had started to fray, so after reading about several replacement bands and reading the reviews I decided on this band. It was really easy to attach and I love the look of it! I have a small wrist and it fits snuggly and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hanlin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sharp look
customer_reviews.text: Love all of these in the different colors. Quality case to I love that!! I use there cases even with my other band. So now when I want a case I get on of these bands because why buy one case for almost the same price as these bands with cases!!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Great product AND even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: So...I chose the camel/rose gold band, which I love! If you notice, the protective silicone case that comes with this color of band is shown as clear, which is partly the reason why I chose this band. When I received it I was slightly disappointed, though, ONLY because a rose gold silicone protector came with the watch band instead of a clear protector. I quickly emailed the seller (information on the cute little card inside the packaging) and explained the situation and without hesitation, the company went into action and corrected the error immediately! Thank you so much, WFEAGL. It’s perfect! Totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elijah & Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Simple, nice, thin band
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. The size is perfect, not too small. The leather band is not the BEST material out there BUT it is really good enough. Like the fact that it came w/ the siliconeish wrap for the top. It gives me some security over it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Salgado

customer_reviews.title: My go to band
customer_reviews.text: Love this band! Looks very professional. The thick bands make me itch and sweat for some reason. This leather band is weightless and looks so nice! I have the space grey model and thought it would look funky with the gold against it but it actually looks really sleek!
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful band
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this come packaged very cute but it also is a really nice band. I have the series 5 44mm and it looks really nice! I’ve had it for a few weeks and have had no issues. I plan to purchase more colors from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cute but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The band was adorable and I loved the little protector it had with it. However it did feel pretty cheap and was uncomfortable to wear. The buckle kept getting snagged in my hair when I brushed it behind my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wouldn’t regret this purchase so long as the quality of the leather (or fake leather, who knows) was good. I will say that I am definitely not disappointed! It’s cute, it doesn’t feel bulky, and best of all - it’s high class. Perfect for the fashionable 9-5 type. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Worth it overall
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize how small it would be, and it makes my watch look huge. But, that was my own fault. It serves its purpose and does what I need it to do. Plus, it came with the bumper and I love it! I just needed something quick and easy and fast since I use my watch at work and I record times and whatnot. Will probably be purchasing more in the future! Only other thing is, I’m not used to the feel of the band around my wrist just yet, so we will see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this band looks! It is so much nicer than the ordinary Iwatch band. It was easy to install and nice quality. However, I can not wear it. The band rubs on the bone on my wrist and wore it raw. I was so sad because I really liked the way it looked, but reverted right back to that boring band for comfort's sake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda skinny😯
customer_reviews.text: I just got a brand new Apple Watch Series 5, 44 mm. It has a pretty large face on IG and this band is small in my opinion. If you are used to wearing a 44mm face watch, no worries. If not, it definitely takes some getting used to. The band came exactly as described. It’s super cute and sleek. Perfect for work or church!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rosegold watch color match.
customer_reviews.text: I’d just like to give 5 stars for actually matching the rosegold color to the rosegold of the apple watch. I’ve seen many bands that fail to match the perfect rosegold color, and for the longest time regretted purchasing the rosegold colored watch. Not anymore though, I’ve finally found the perfect colored watch band!
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: Slim & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described by seller, leather seems to be great quality, the skinny band is different and I love it. Shipping was super quick, free face bumper was included in the order! I would order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking but doesn't balance to watch
customer_reviews.text: this is most likely a personal preference but I don't like this band. while it looks nice and quality is nice the watch is "top heavy". the wider band seems to anchor and balance the watch much better on my wrist. I ordered a three pack of the wider band
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Checks every box
customer_reviews.text: Cute, seems to be high quality, very easy to change out, many different size settings, I don't have a bad thing to say about this watch band. I especially love how flat the clasp is which is perfect for office work. One month in and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Sim band
customer_reviews.text: The thing I hate most about typical Apple Watch straps is the width of the band. This strap is the exception to that. The only negative, is that silver on the clasps of the strap is tarnishing and turning an ugly goldish/copper color.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Funk

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking and dainty but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this band. I was looking for something professional for work. Can’t wear my self expressive bands in my corporate meetings. Comfortable, easy to attach, well worth the money. Only negative was the buckle part can irritate if it’s at a certain angle or I’m leaning on it. All in all I’d recommend this dainty band.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

product_meta.title: WFEAGL Leather Bands Compatible with Apple Watch 38mm 40mm 42mm 44mm, Top Grain Leather Band Slim & Thin Wristband for iWatch Series 5 & Series 4/3/2/1 (Black Band+Rose Gold Adapter, 38mm 40mm)
feature_bullets: Fit Wrist Size: Fits 5.3"-7.7" (130mm-195mm) wrists. You will get extra:a practical TPU scratch-resistant flexible rose gold protector for iWatch Series 5 & 4 & 3 & 2 & 1 38mm 40mm.
Superior Quality Leather: Top grain genuine leather with fashionable craftsmanship. Anti-slip,durable,comfortable,breathable & no peculiar smell.

Adapters: The part of the connection between the watch and the strap. The adapter is processed through special craft, slide into the watch nicely, easy to install or remove, and it is very sturdy,not fall apart.
Workmanship,Appearance,Wear: Special hollowed-out watch band is excellent in workmanship, more Lighter and breathable, wear very comfortable. Looks more elegant as well as feminine.
Strap Features: there are a lot of colors and styles for you to choose, suitable for any place, so that your watch looks different.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars7,683 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
